text: int main ( ) { int * * ptr , i , j , ln , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( ; n ; n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ln ) ; ptr = ( int * * ) malloc ( ln * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ln ; i ++ ) { ptr [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < ln ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ptr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = ln - 1 ; i ; i -- ) { for ( j = i ; j ; j -- ) { ptr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] += MAX ( ptr [ i ] [ j ] , ptr [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , ptr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
